sourcesContent:
import React,{useState, useContext} from 'react' import {SearchContent} from ".//searchContent" import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import '../app.css' import JSONDATA from '../data/plants.json' import {PlantContext} from "../app.js" function PlantInfo (props) { const params = useParams() const {plants,addNewPlant} = useContext(PlantContext) const result = JSONDATA.filter(plant => plant.name == params.name)[0] return( <>

Plant Name: {params.name}

Plant Species {result.species}
Fertilizer {result.fertilizer}
Water Temperature {result.waterTemp}
Humidity {result.humidity}
Growing Season {result.growingSeason}
Environment Temperatrue {result.envTemp}
Used For {result.usedFor}
Light Levels {result.lightLevels}
) } export default PlantInfo;
